verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*, giving \w approval|strong="G4909"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* Stephen’s death. \w On|strong="G1909"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w persecution|strong="G1375"\w* broke \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w except|strong="G4133"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* apostles \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w scattered|strong="G1289"\w* \w throughout|strong="G2596"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*.

Philip in Samaria

\w Prior|strong="G4391"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G1722"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* practiced \w sorcery|strong="G3096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w astounded|strong="G1839"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G1484"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w claimed|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w someone|strong="G5100"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*,

Perhaps \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* forgive \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* intent \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

Philip and the Ethiopian (Isaiah 53:1–8)

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w angel|strong="G2597"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, “\w Get|strong="G2532"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w south|strong="G3314"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w desert|strong="G2048"\w* \w road|strong="G3598"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w goes|strong="G4198"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G2597"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Gaza|strong="G1048"\w*.”

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w ran|strong="G4370"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G1097"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w* reading \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*. “\w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w understand|strong="G1097"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* reading?” \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*.

“\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*,” \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w unless|strong="G1437"\w* \w someone|strong="G5100"\w* \w guides|strong="G3594"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*?” \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w invited|strong="G3870"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* come \w up|strong="G3361"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w sit|strong="G2523"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* eunuch \w was|strong="G1510"\w* reading \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w passage|strong="G4042"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Scripture|strong="G1124"\w*: “\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* led \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w slaughter|strong="G4967"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* lamb \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w shearer|strong="G2751"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* silent, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* open \w His|strong="G1909"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.
